name: qui
description: A fast, single-binary qBittorrent web UI: manage multiple instances, automate torrent workflows, and cross-seed across trackers.
readme_summary: qui is a fast, single-binary web UI for qBittorrent that allows users to manage multiple qBittorrent instances from a single interface. It automates torrent workflows, supports cross-seeding across trackers, and offers features like scheduled backups and a reverse proxy.
primary_use_case: Managing multiple qBittorrent instances and automating torrent management tasks through a unified web interface.
cover_image_prompt: A conductor orchestrating a symphony of torrents. The conductor, representing the 'qui' interface, stands on a podium with a baton, directing multiple distinct qBittorrent instances (visualized as small, stylized servers or towers) that are actively downloading and uploading torrents. Data streams flow from various tracker icons (like stylized globes or network nodes) towards the servers, and matching torrents are seamlessly passed between them, symbolizing cross-seeding. Subtle UI elements with progress bars and torrent names are visible on small screens around the conductor. The scene is set in a grand, modern concert hall with a clean, vibrant color palette, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a focus on clarity and dynamic flow.

name: tufw
readme_summary: tufw is a Go package that provides a terminal user interface for managing ufw (Uncomplicated Firewall) rules. It offers a user-friendly way to add, edit, and remove firewall rules directly from the command line.
key_features: Add, edit, and remove ufw rules
primary_use_case: To provide an intuitive, interactive terminal-based interface for managing the Uncomplicated Firewall (ufw), making firewall rule management more accessible to users less familiar with the command-line interface.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic firewall character wearing a conductor's hat, standing at a console with multiple glowing levers and buttons. The character is orchestrating a flow of digital traffic, represented by streams of light. Green streams represent allowed traffic, flowing smoothly into a stylized computer network. Red streams represent blocked traffic, being neatly diverted away by the firewall character's actions. Subtle 'ufw' text appears on the console. The scene is set in a clean, modern server room with soft, ambient lighting. The overall style is a 3D isometric illustration with clear, bold colors and a focus on intuitive controls.

name: poznote
description: Poznote is a personal note-taking and documentation platform.
readme_summary: Poznote is a self-hosted, web-based personal note-taking and documentation platform built with JavaScript. It allows users to organize their thoughts, ideas, and documentation in a private and secure environment, accessible from any device.
primary_use_case: To provide a private, self-hosted platform for individuals to manage their personal notes and documentation.
cover_image_prompt: A stylized, open book with glowing digital pages, floating in a serene, organized study. From the book, streams of organized information, like digital threads, are neatly weaving into a structured, interconnected web. Subtle UI elements resembling a clean note-taking interface are visible on some pages. The repository name 'Poznote' is subtly etched onto the book's cover. The overall mood is calm, productive, and secure, rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style with a clean, minimalist aesthetic and a soft, inviting color palette.

name: WindowsCleanerUtility
description: A minimal windows batch script that cleans your PC from temporary files.
readme_summary: WindowsCleanerUtility is a minimal batch script designed to clean your Windows PC by removing various types of temporary and unnecessary files. It aims to free up disk space and potentially improve system performance by automating cleanup tasks.
primary_use_case: Automated cleaning of temporary files and system junk on Windows to free up disk space.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, anthropomorphic computer character holding a broom and dustpan, actively sweeping away piles of digital 'dust bunnies' and 'clutter' (represented by small, abstract icons of temporary files, logs, and old data) from a clean, organized digital desktop. The character is smiling, and a subtle 'clean' aura emanates from the desktop. In the background, a small, stylized progress bar shows the cleaning process nearing completion. The 'WindowsCleanerUtility' logo is subtly integrated into the scene, perhaps on the broom or a small digital sign. The overall mood is helpful and efficient. Style: 3D isometric illustration with bright, clean colors and clear, simple shapes.

name: CyberScraper-2077
description: A Powerful web scraper powered by LLM | OpenAI, Gemini & Ollama
readme_summary: CyberScraper 2077 is an AI-powered Python web scraping tool that leverages advanced LLMs like OpenAI and Gemini, along with local Ollama models, to extract data with high precision. It features a user-friendly Streamlit interface, supports various export formats, and includes advanced functionalities like Tor network integration, stealth mode, and captcha bypassing.
key_features: AI-Powered Extraction using LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Ollama)
Multi-Format Export (JSON, CSV, HTML, SQL, Excel)
Smart Parsing and Structuring of Data
primary_use_case: Automated and intelligent web scraping of data from various websites, including challenging ones requiring stealth and advanced parsing, for analysis and integration into other systems.
cover_image_prompt: A futuristic netrunner, depicted as a skilled artisan, meticulously extracting glowing data streams from a complex, holographic web structure. The netrunner uses a sleek, cybernetic interface, with streams of data flowing into organized containers labeled 'CSV', 'JSON', and 'SQL'. Subtle digital particles and faint code snippets float around, hinting at the AI's intelligence. The background is a neon-drenched, cyberpunk cityscape at night, with the repository name 'CyberScraper 2077' subtly integrated into a holographic billboard. The style should be a vibrant, 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clear visual metaphors for data extraction and organization.

name: F_EX
readme_summary: F_EX is an experimental Java IDE built with JavaFX, offering a comprehensive code editor, debugger, refactoring tools, project management for Gradle, Maven, and pure Java projects, and code analysis capabilities.
key_features: Code Editor with syntax highlighting, error highlighting, autocompletion, project indexing, line numbers, breakpoints, image viewing, multiple tabs, find/replace.
Full-featured debugger with JDWP support, breakpoints, thread management, call stack, variables view, and step execution controls.
Refactoring tools including Rename (symbol and file), Undo Refactor, and preview of changes.
Search and navigation features like Find in Files, Go to Class/Symbol/File, Recent Files, Find Usages, and Action Search.
Project management for Gradle, Maven, pure Java, and IntelliJ IDEA projects, including project creation and class generation.
Code diagnostics and analysis using javac, with real-time error/warning highlighting and Quick Fixes.
Run and build capabilities with support for multiple entry points and project type detection.
primary_use_case: An integrated development environment for Java developers, providing a full suite of tools for coding, debugging, refactoring, and project management.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman meticulously assembling a complex clockwork mechanism, representing the F_EX IDE. Gears and springs, each labeled with 'Code', 'Debug', 'Refactor', and 'Project', interlock smoothly. The craftsman's hands, glowing with digital energy, are shown placing a final 'Build' component. Input is represented by scattered blueprints and raw materials, while the output is a perfectly functioning, intricate clockwork device radiating a soft light. Subtle UI elements of code snippets and project trees are visible on a nearby workbench. The scene is rendered in a 3D isometric illustration style, with a clean, organized workshop setting and warm, focused lighting, emphasizing precision and comprehensive functionality.
